org.jboss.msc.service

Interface ServiceContainer


  • public interface ServiceContainer
    A service container. This class is thread safe.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd, Flavia Rainone, Richard Opalka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceRegistry newRegistry()
      Creates new registry associated with this container.
      void shutdown(Transaction transaction)
      Shuts down the container, removing all registries and their services.

    • Method Detail

      • newRegistry

        ServiceRegistry newRegistry()
        Creates new registry associated with this container.
        Returns:
        container registry

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(Transaction transaction)
              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                     InvalidTransactionStateException
        Shuts down the container, removing all registries and their services.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if transaction is null or if transaction controller associated with transaction is not the same as the one associated with this service container.
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if transaction is not active.
